ygData.subject: Re: Max damage?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I really hope that I am incorrect, but that would also explain why we are attacked when starting up a song.  It makes us appear to be vulnerable instead of
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 12 Jul 1999 RON_TALBOT@... wrote:
>
> OUCH! If this is true then Weaving songs may not be the best of
> ideas. More chances for a full damage hit. Anyone else notice this?
> I will watch closely from now on but my general impression is that he
> might be right... Makes being a support bard make much more sense.
> If this is true (shudder) then this could change the whole methodology
> behind running a bard character.

I really hope that I am incorrect, but that would also explain why we are
attacked when starting up a song. It makes us appear to be vulnerable
instead of being a threat. I think I will try to check this out provided
my ISP doesn't lag me out tonight. Hmm.. I think I will start a newbie
character tonight and do some trial runs attack very basic creatures like
bats to confirm this. Though Chant is not a good thing to use since it
makes us harder to hit =).

Treilanin Loreweaver 20th Chorus Bard of Kelethin
Aariel 5th Circle Mage of Felwithe
Honour Guard
